revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Actiontec GT704WG Rev. B]] to [[Actiontec GT704WGB]] over redirect
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=GT704WG |revision=B |upc=789286807755 |asin=B0036VO6NW |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Verizon |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_date=07/11/2008 |fcc_id=LNQGT704WGB |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=XXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^[A-F0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:1F:90,00:26:62 |oui_eth=00:1F:90,00:26:62 }} {{TagLine|Wireless DSL Gateway (Next Gen)}} :''for Verizon High Speed Internet Access''
:[http://www.actiontec.com/support/product_details.php?pid=194 Support page]{{â€¢}}[http://support.actiontec.com/doc_files/GT704-WG-B_Vz_User_Manual_30.15.0.pdf User Manual]
"Actiontec" and "06113AD" are silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos.
This device uses the standard 5 letter/number SSID :used by many '''Actiontec''' products.
NOTE: Remote Management Port is 2420 (not shown :in the GUI nor any other support docs)
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/actiontec/gt704wg ''Actiontec GT704WG'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :- aka '''GT704WGB''' BCM6358?
